page.title: 06Home Life in East Leicester.
page.content: My name is Ivan,& my family originally came from{Goa.}We are{Catholics}& go to Sacred Heart Church. I like playing football,I also enjoy swimming at Spence St.Baths. At home I live comfortably with my mum,dad & elder brother Fabian. We are a very lucky family. We've all been mentioned in the local newspaper & my brother has been on television. We eat English, Italian,Indian & Chinese food. I don't like going to bed because it is boring upstairs. In the morning I find it hard to get up so my mum has to wake me. I dress,have my breakfast of cornflakes & toast,clean my teeth & leave for school at 8:30 a.m. I live about one mile from school. My dad works at a bank & my mum works at Midland Engineering.
